Package cs.eng1.piazzapanic.food.ingredients

Class BasicGrillable

java.lang.Object
cs.eng1.piazzapanic.food.ingredients.Ingredient
cs.eng1.piazzapanic.food.ingredients.BasicGrillable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grillable, Holdable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Patty
public abstract class BasicGrillable extends Ingredient implements Grillable
A base class for ingredients that need to be grilled, such as Patty. Implements the Grillable interface to enable the chopping functionality.
Author:
Ross Holmes, Andrey Samoilov
